CustomField.formula: IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && IsCollaborationProgress__c = True, IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c == 0,'Collaboration In Progress ' + HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIReadOnlyPartner&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom_View", "View Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c==0, 'Collaboration In Progress ' + HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIReadOnlyWithDOD&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom_View", "View Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c>0,'Collaboration In Progress ' + HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIReadOnlyWithDODDPD&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom_View", "View Products/Pricing"),"_self"),null))),Null)
CustomField.label: Collaboration
